member.name: T:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.AliasesAttribute
member.summary: Adds aliases to this command or group.

member.summary: Gets this group's aliases.

member.summary: Adds aliases to this command or group.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.CheckBaseAttribute
member.summary: Represents a base for all command pre-execution check attributes.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.CheckBaseAttribute.CanExecute(DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.CommandContext,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Asynchronously checks whether this command can be executed within given context.
member.param: Context to check execution ability for.
Whether this check is being executed from help or not. This can be used to probe whether command can be run without setting off certain fail conditions (such as cooldowns).
member.returns: Whether the command can be executed in given context.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.CommandAttribute
member.summary: Marks this method as a command.

member.summary: Gets the name of this command.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.CommandAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Marks this method as a command with specified name.
member.param: Name of this command.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.CooldownAttribute
member.summary: Defines a cooldown for this command. This allows you to define how many times can users execute a specific command

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.CooldownAttribute.MaxUses
member.summary: Gets the maximum number of uses before this command triggers a cooldown for its bucket.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.CooldownAttribute.Reset
member.summary: Gets the time after which the cooldown is reset.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.CooldownAttribute.BucketType
member.summary: Gets the type of the cooldown bucket. This determines how cooldowns are applied.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.CooldownAttribute.Buckets
member.summary: Gets the cooldown buckets for this command.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.CooldownAttribute.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Double,DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.CooldownBucketType)
member.summary: Defines a cooldown for this command. This means that users will be able to use the command a specific number of times before they have to wait to use it again.
member.param: Number of times the command can be used before triggering a cooldown.
Number of seconds after which the cooldown is reset.
Type of cooldown bucket. This allows controlling whether the bucket will be cooled down per user, guild, channel, or globally.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.CooldownAttribute.GetBucket(DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.CommandContext)
member.summary: Gets a cooldown bucket for given command context.
member.param: Command context to get cooldown bucket for.
member.returns: Requested cooldown bucket, or null if one wasn't present.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.CooldownAttribute.GetRemainingCooldown(DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.CommandContext)
member.summary: Calculates the cooldown remaining for given command context.
member.param: Context for which to calculate the cooldown.
member.returns: Remaining cooldown, or zero if no cooldown is active.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.CooldownAttribute.GetBucketId(DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.CommandContext,System.UInt64@,System.UInt64@,System.UInt64@)
member.summary: Calculates bucket ID for given command context.
member.param: Context for which to calculate bucket ID for.
ID of the user with which this bucket is associated.
ID of the channel with which this bucket is associated.
ID of the guild with which this bucket is associated.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.CooldownBucketType
member.summary: Defines how are command cooldowns applied.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.CooldownBucketType.User
member.summary: Denotes that the command will have its cooldown applied per-user.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.CooldownBucketType.Channel
member.summary: Denotes that the command will have its cooldown applied per-channel.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.CooldownBucketType.Guild
member.summary: Denotes that the command will have its cooldown applied per-guild. In DMs, this applies the cooldown per-channel.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.CooldownBucketType.Global
member.summary: Denotes that the command will have its cooldown applied globally.

member.summary: Gets the ID of the bucket. This is used to distinguish between cooldown buckets.

member.summary: Gets the remaining number of uses before the cooldown is triggered.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.CommandCooldownBucket.Reset
member.summary: Gets the time after which this cooldown resets.

member.summary: Defines that usage of this command is restricted to NSFW channels.

member.summary: Defines that usage of this command is restricted to the owner of the bot.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.RequirePermissionsAttribute
member.summary: Defines that usage of this command is restricted to members with specified permissions. This check also verifies that the bot has the same permissions.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.RequirePermissionsAttribute.Permissions
member.summary: Gets the permissions required by this attribute.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.RequirePermissionsAttribute.IgnoreDms
member.summary: Gets or sets this check's behaviour in DMs. True means the check will always pass in DMs, whereas false means that it will always fail.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.RequirePermissionsAttribute.#ctor(DSharpPlus.Permissions)
member.summary: Defines that usage of this command is restricted to members with specified permissions. This check also verifies that the bot has the same permissions.
member.param: Permissions required to execute this command.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.Attributes.RequireRolesAttributeAttribute
member.summary: Defines that usage of this command is restricted to members with specified role. Note that it's much preferred to restrict access using .

member.summary: Gets the name of the role required to execute this command.

member.summary: Defines that usage of this command is restricted to members with specified role. Note that it's much preferred to restrict access using .

member.summary: Gets the permissions required by this attribute.

member.summary: Defines that usage of this command is restricted to members with specified permissions.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.CustomPrefixPredicate
member.summary: Represents a delegate for a function that takes a message, and returns the position of the start of command invocation in the message. It has to return -1 if prefix is not present.
member.param: Message to check for prefix.
member.returns: Position of the command invocation or -1 if not present.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.CommandsNextConfiguration
member.summary: Represents a configuration for .

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.CommandsNextConfiguration.StringPrefix
member.summary: Sets the string prefix used for commands. By default has no value.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.CommandsNextConfiguration.CustomPrefixPredicate
member.summary: Sets the custom prefix predicate used for commands. By default is not specified.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.CommandsNextConfiguration.EnableMentionPrefix
member.summary: Sets whether to allow bot's mention as command prefix. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.CommandsNextConfiguration.SelfBot
member.summary: Sets whether the bot should only respond to messages from its own account. This is used for selfbots. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.CommandsNextConfiguration.CaseSensitive
member.summary: Sets whether the commands should be case-sensitive. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.CommandsNextConfiguration.EnableDefaultHelp
member.summary: Sets whether to enable default help command. Disable this if you want to make your own help command. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.CommandsNextConfiguration.DefaultHelpChecks
member.summary: Sets the default pre-execution checks for the built-in help command. Only applicable if default help is enabled.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.CommandsNextConfiguration.EnableDms
member.summary: Sets whether to enable commands via direct messages. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.CommandsNextConfiguration.Dependencies
member.summary: Sets the dependency collection for this CommandsNext instance.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.CommandsNext.CommandsNextConfiguration.IgnoreExtraArguments
member.summary: Gets whether any extra arguments passed to commands should be ignored or not. If this is set to false, extra arguments will throw. Defaults to true.
